perks.name: Double Tap
perks.effect: Increases fire rate of all 'bullet' weapons by 33%, as well as Bouncing Betty speed.

perks.name: Speed Cola
perks.effect: Increases reload speed by 50 percent and massively increases the speed at which players can rebuild barriers.

drops.name: Max Ammo
drops.effect: Gives all alive players the maximum ammunition possible to obtain for whatever weapon the players are carrying, although the player's current magazine will not be replenished.

drops.name: Instakill
drops.effect: All damage sources from the player to instantly kill a zombie at any round for 30 seconds.

drops.name: Double Points
drops.effect: Doubles the amount of points earned for 30 seconds.

drops.name: Nuke
drops.effect: Kills any zombies that are currently on the map.

drops.name: Carpenter
drops.effect: All windows will be repaired and players get 200 points
